sentences.english: No local financing for abortion services in the District of Columbia.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府也不應該爲哥倫比亞區的墜胎服務買單。

sentences.english: Abortion, as ever, will be a big electoral issue in the coming campaign.
sentences.chinese: 和往年一樣，墜胎仍將是本次選舉中一個重要議題。

sentences.english: Study: No higher mental health risk after abortion.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，墜胎不會增加患上精神病的機率。
